segments.text: You'v been work here for nearly a month , how do you feel about the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . Thank you for your help . I am always busy with this job , I feel a bit tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had the same feeling when I first came to work here . but after a period of time , I feel better , I am sure you ' ll get used to this busy job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also feel that work efficiency here is very high . and you have strong working ability and professional skill , it seems that you know all , that's really wonderful !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know the phrase the survival of the fittest . We have no choices .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right , I have to work .
segments.speaker: S2
